attributes.action: Accept the apology of the American people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned do acknowledge the inexcusable treatment of Great Britain's Prime Minister Gordon Brown by the American President Barak Obama, and hereby request that you accept our sincere apology.

We further request that, when you next visit the United States (aka the Colonies), you may feel free to attend a private dinner at any of our own homes. (We do not have the means to provide a state dinner, but we'd be honored to have your company at our personal table.)

Finally, we petition you to accept the gift of our undying admiration and gratitude.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
